headline.main: In The Nation; A Step Forward in the Food Problem

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 30 -- An important facility which the President did not extend to Chester C. Davis as Food Administrator has been granted to his successor -- membership on the boards of the Office of War Mobilization and the War Production Board. This will enable Marvin Jones, the new Administrator, to reach and be a continuous part of the central network of Federal controls.
